tag_list: b2c, seo, webservice, curation, event, leisure, brand-content, tourism, hotel-booking
overview: Startuper since 1995 with Worldnet, one of the 5 french historical ISP. Founder of Internet-Telecom in 1998, first VISP plaform, and Axidium, early online advertising company, both sold to Orange in 2001. Founder of viaEuropa / viaFrance, first events webservice content curation platform.
